summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and to City participation in the Urban Traffic Operations Program to Increase Capacity and Safety (TOPICS) pursuant to Ordinance 98606, authorizing an agreement with the State of Washington for reimbursement to the State of its costs in connection with its review of plans, specifications and estimates of work, for the Aurora Avenue Median Barrier project, and making an appropriation from the Arterial Development Fund therefor.
